item.title: ubuntu 常用软件安装
item.author: zhangyuhu
item.description: cmake 升级 apt remove cmake cd /usr/src wget https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/releases/download/v3.16.0/cmake-3.16.0.tar.gz tar -zxvf cmake-3.16.0.tar.gz cd cmake-3.16.0 apt install libssl-dev build-essential ./bootstrap && make && sudo make install cmake --version readline wget -c ftp://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/readline/readline-6.2.tar.gz tar -zxvf readline-6.2.tar.gz cd readline-6.2 ./configure //这个地方一定要指定路径,要不然要报错(一般在/usr/loc
